summary: This is a calendar entry for the arraignment of Ghislaine Maxwell on the S2 indictment, scheduled for April 23, 2021, at the SDNY courthouse (500 Pearl Street, Courtroom 24B). It is an administrative document setting the date, time, and location for the court proceeding.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual being arraigned on the S2 indictment, as indicated by the event title 'Maxwell Arraignment on S2 Indictment'.

events.title: Maxwell Arraignment on S2 Indictment
events.description: Scheduled court proceeding for the arraignment of Ghislaine Maxwell on the S2 indictment.

locations: 500 Pearl Street, Courtroom 24B, New York, NY (SDNY Courthouse)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled for an arraignment on April 23, 2021, on the S2 indictment.
The proceeding was to be held at the SDNY courthouse at 500 Pearl Street in Courtroom 24B.
The calendar entry was created on April 8, 2021, and modified on April 19, 2021, indicating administrative planning for the court date.
